0.description: Second half !!! C'mon Manchester City?!!!! Defeat West Brom !!!!!

1.description: LFC, MUFC and West Ham have scored. The other three games all at 0-0, including City vs West Brom. #EPL

2.description: LFC, MUFC and West Ham have scored. The other three games all at 0-0, including City vs West Brom. #EPL  Chelsea and Man Utd kept the rest of the pack chasing with 4-2 wins against Tottenham and Stoke respectively. Here's all the action as it happened.

4.description: Shane Long has given West Brom the lead against Manchester City.

5.description: West brom 1 up yes . Shane long

6.description: Shane Long scores for West Brom. Bam!

8.description: GOAL West Brom take the lead against champions Man City, Shane Long poking in from eight yards after 67 mins at a jubilant Hawthorns #WBAMCI

9.description: West Brom 1-0 Man city Manchester United 4-2 Stoke

11.description: Shane Long pulls West Brom ahead of Man City in the 67 minute. WBA 1-0 MCFC.
